apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.subtitle: Manage your API keys for AI services like Gemini, OpenAI, and Anthropic
apiKeys.yourKeysDescription: API keys you've added for AI services
apiKeys.noKeys: You haven't added any API keys yet

info.title: Your Keys, Your Control
info.description: Add your own API keys to use AI features. Your keys are encrypted and stored securely. You can remove them at any time.

security.title: Security Notice
security.description: Your API keys are encrypted with AES-256 before storage. We never log or transmit your keys in plain text. Only you can access and use your keys.

addDialog.title: Add API Key
addDialog.description: Add an API key for an AI service provider
addDialog.name: Key Name

deleteDialog.title: Delete API Key
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

validation.required: Please fill in all required fields

toast.testSuccess: API key is valid and working

connectedAccounts.subtitle: Link third-party accounts for easier sign-in

providers.title: OAuth Providers
providers.subtitle: Connect your accounts to enable single sign-on

google.name: Google
google.description: Sign in with your Google account

github.name: GitHub
github.description: Sign in with your GitHub account

reasons.faster: Sign in faster without entering your password
reasons.secure: Securely link your identity across platforms
reasons.features: Enable features that integrate with third-party services

securityNote.title: Security Note
securityNote.text: Disconnecting an account won't delete any data from that service. You can always reconnect later. We only store your email and unique identifier from connected accounts.

loginHistory.title: Login History
loginHistory.subtitle: Review your recent login activity and detect suspicious access
loginHistory.recentActivityHint: Your login history for the past 30 days

security.title: Security Alerts
security.description: Get notified about security events like new logins, password changes, and suspicious activity

updates.description: Stay informed about new features, improvements, and important product announcements

marketing.title: Marketing & Promotions

weeklyDigest.title: Weekly Digest
weeklyDigest.description: Get a weekly summary of your account activity and important updates

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.subtitle: Quickly enable or disable all optional notifications

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.subtitle: Customize your experience with theme, language, and display settings

regional.title: Regional Settings
regional.subtitle: Set your timezone and language preferences

dateTime.title: Date & Time Format
dateTime.subtitle: Choose how dates and times are displayed

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.subtitle: Manage your data and account privacy settings

export.title: Export Your Data
export.subtitle: Download a copy of all your personal data stored in our system

items.other: Any other data associated with your account

export.hint: Your data will be prepared as a downloadable archive. This process may take a few minutes. You'll receive an email notification when your data is ready.

toast.requested: Data export has been requested. We'll notify you when it's ready.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.subtitle: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
delete.warningText: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data, including:
delete.reasonPlaceholder: Help us improve by sharing your feedback...
delete.gracePeriod: After requesting deletion, you'll have a 14-day grace period to cancel. After that, your account and all data will be permanently deleted.

toast.scheduled: Account deletion has been scheduled. You can cancel this within the grace period.

bio.label: Bio
bio.placeholder: Write a short bio about yourself...
bio.hint: Brief description for your profile. URLs are hyperlinked.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.subtitle: Update your name and email address

email.label: Email Address
email.changeWarning: Changing your email will require verification

quickSettings.title: Quick Settings
quickSettings.subtitle: Manage other aspects of your account

toast.profileUpdated: Your profile has been updated successfully.
toast.avatarUploaded: Your avatar has been uploaded successfully.
toast.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 5MB.

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: Manage your password, two-factor authentication, and active sessions

password.title: Change Password
password.subtitle: Update your password to keep your account secure
password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

toast.changed: Your password has been changed successfully.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.subtitle: Add an extra layer of security to your account
twoFactor.notEnabledHint: Protect your account with two-factor authentication
twoFactor.enabledHint: Your account is protected with two-factor authentication
twoFactor.disableWarning: This will make your account less secure. Enter your authentication code to confirm.

setupSteps.step1: Install an authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
setupSteps.step2: Scan the QR code below or enter the secret manually
setupSteps.step3: Enter the 6-digit code from your app to verify

backupCodes.title: Backup Codes
backupCodes.hint: Save these backup codes in a secure location. Each code can only be used once.

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.subtitle: Manage your active sessions and sign out from other devices

toast.allRevoked: All other sessions have been revoked.

subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences
title: Settings

alerts.title: Usage Alerts
